name: Robo Cross
description:
You play as a robot who has forgotten his movement programming. You get one use  of each skill before you forget your code. Pick up scripts to restore your short term memory. 

Controls: 

Left Arrow: Go left 

Right Arrow: Go right

Z: Jump

X: Shoot

R resets the stage. 

Remember you only get one use of each skill per level unless you replenish it.
